resources.string: Canberra is the capital of Australia.
All questions Done! You have passed the quiz!

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: 1. The earth is the fourth planet from the sun.
2. The planet Venus has no moons.
3. Jupiter is composed mostly of iron.
4. The sun is a star of average size.
5. A lunar eclipse occurs when the sun passes.
